Description: 5 segmented cylindrical beads in two different sizes and one disc-shaped bead made of faience. A: Two somewhat larger segmented cylindrical beads, one of them broken into two joining fragments, the other broken off as well. No coloured glaze preserved, only the whitish core. B: Two smaller segmented cylindrical beads, both broken off, one of them has faint remains of a light green glaze. C: One disc-shaped bead made of faience with a light blue glaze.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
